doc.title: Confession Stand
doc.plot: "Confession Stand" is about a man who is stifled by the confines of his life, he sets off on a journey of separation. While on this journey, he has a chance encounter with a mysterious woman who offers him a chance to express himself and look at his life more objectively. This encounter, though, puts the man in a precarious situation that affects the course of his life and his future.
